sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form @submit.prevent>
        <custom-input class="input-title" placeholder="Название" type="text"/>
        <custom-input class="input-quantity" placeholder="Количество" type="number"/>
        <custom-input class="input-distance" placeholder="Расстояние" type="number"/>
        <custom-button @click="addRow" style="margin: 10px">Добавить строку</custom-button>
    </form>
</template>

<script>
    import axios from 'axios';

    export default {
        methods: {
            addRow: async (table) => {
                const $host = axios.create({
                    baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_API_URL
                })
                const data = await $host.post('api/table', table)
                return data
            }
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="css" scoped>
    .input-title,
    .input-quantity,
    .input-distance {
        width: 400px;
    }
</style>
